version_description:
### Fixed
- Fix a potential race condition where some users would never be prompted for push notifications
- Fixed an issue for profile photos not uploading because of a regression when consolidating resources

### Added
- New bank icon for bank payout accounts
- Added a new join challenge accept page with challenge cut off times and max daily check-ins info
- Turned on transfer acceleration for profile photo updates.

### Fixed
- Fix a potential race condition where some users would never be prompted for push notifications
- Fixed an issue for profile photos not uploading because of a regression when consolidating resources

### Added
- New bank icon for bank payout accounts
- Added a new join challenge accept page with challenge cut off times and max daily check-ins info
- Turned on transfer acceleration for profile photo updates.

We have greatly improved the performance and check-in viewing experience for very large challenges

- New continuous scrolling feature on the explore page
- New helpful and informational footer banner that explains current status of your checkin
- Support for 1080p resolution for pitch videos, and use smarter defaults for check-ins

We have greatly improved the performance and check-in viewing experience for very large challenges

- New continuous scrolling feature on the explore page
- New helpful and informational footer banner that explains current status of your checkin
- Support for 1080p resolution for pitch videos, and use smarter defaults for check-ins

- iOS 13 dark mode fixes
- Fixed a crash when playing a check-ins from completed challenges
- Fix an issue where some check-in chat comments wouldn't open
- Continuous performance improvements for very large challenges. Faster chat and check-in loading.

- iOS 13 dark mode fixes
- Fixed a crash when playing a check-ins from completed challenges
- Fix an issue where some check-in chat comments wouldn't open
- Continuous performance improvements for very large challenges. Faster chat and check-in loading.

- Fix an issue where error messages were using technical jargon instead of human readable messages
- Fix account balance page not loading transactions
- Fix broken "copy share url" from the more menu

- Fix an issue where error messages were using technical jargon instead of human readable messages
- Fix account balance page not loading transactions
- Fix broken "copy share url" from the more menu

- Fix a regression where external accounts were missing in the settings page
- Fix a regression where joined players are not able to leave the challenge in the 24 hour grace period.
- Fixed a crash when attempting to delete a local comment before it was ever saved

- Fix a regression where external accounts were missing in the settings page
- Fix a regression where joined players are not able to leave the challenge in the 24 hour grace period.
- Fixed a crash when attempting to delete a local comment before it was ever saved

- You can now schedule when a challenge starts
- Refresh the settings screen when unlinking a login provider
- Carousel is now interactive when fading out
- Fixed opening challenge from deeplink - it no longer opens as PageSheet
- Fix phone number verification, code verification wasn't being submitted.

- You can now schedule when a challenge starts
- Refresh the settings screen when unlinking a login provider
- Carousel is now interactive when fading out
- Fixed opening challenge from deeplink - it no longer opens as PageSheet
- Fix phone number verification, code verification wasn't being submitted.

- Flagging crash
- Show "tomorrow" instead of full date
- Remove haptic feedback for drawer
- Scrolling performance

- Flagging crash
- Show "tomorrow" instead of full date
- Remove haptic feedback for drawer
- Scrolling performance

- Proper login flow when leaving a logged out comment
- Table view glitch when opening challenge from deeplink
- Challenge deeplinks would be ignored open if something was already presented: another challenge, profile, create challenge etc.
- Missing cutoff time on check-in button

- Proper login flow when leaving a logged out comment
- Table view glitch when opening challenge from deeplink
- Challenge deeplinks would be ignored open if something was already presented: another challenge, profile, create challenge etc.
- Missing cutoff time on check-in button

- Fixed video description not closing after being edited.
- Improve challenge loading by 60%, cut network requests in half
- Fix an issue where Sign in with Apple ID wouldn't not dismiss in some cases

- Fixed video description not closing after being edited.
- Improve challenge loading by 60%, cut network requests in half
- Fix an issue where Sign in with Apple ID wouldn't not dismiss in some cases

- Fixed missing pagination on challenge players
- Fixed join button appearing after creating a challenge
- A few minor fixes reported by our beta testers (thanks!)

- Fixed missing pagination on challenge players
- Fixed join button appearing after creating a challenge
- A few minor fixes reported by our beta testers (thanks!)

- Fixed crashes around challenge scheduling, and rescheduling.
- Fixed some check-in and pitch videos showing up with blank previews
- Fixed an issue with "Seen by" not loading
- Fixed an issue where some users with draft check-ins not cleaning up
- Fixed an issue where some timelapse videos would fail to record

- Fixed crashes around challenge scheduling, and rescheduling.
- Fixed some check-in and pitch videos showing up with blank previews
- Fixed an issue with "Seen by" not loading
- Fixed an issue where some users with draft check-ins not cleaning up
- Fixed an issue where some timelapse videos would fail to record

- Fix broken edit pitch video
- Fix unfollow that was not working
- Fix broken copy profile url link
- Remove some clunky old code in balance transactions

- Fix broken edit pitch video
- Fix unfollow that was not working
- Fix broken copy profile url link
- Remove some clunky old code in balance transactions

- Fix a few issues related to the challenge drawer not displaying correct menu options
- Better syncing with the check-in drawer when a challenge goes from active to complete

- Fix a few issues related to the challenge drawer not displaying correct menu options
- Better syncing with the check-in drawer when a challenge goes from active to complete

Simplify and improve the weekly challenge experience by introducing days of the week.

- Fix an issue related to unfollowing another user
- Fix an issue where user profiles were not correctly loading challenges

Simplify and improve the weekly challenge experience by introducing days of the week.

- Fix an issue related to unfollowing another user
- Fix an issue where user profiles were not correctly loading challenges
Introducing challenge groups! Now you can create a challenge series, making it easy for both challenge creators and players to keep the challenge going without needing to start from scratch.
Introducing challenge groups! Now you can create a challenge series, making it easy for both challenge creators and players to keep the challenge going without needing to start from scratch.

- New group based comments, including fixes to check-in comments not loading and sometimes even crashing.
- Fixed an issue where sometimes new users weren't being asked to sign up when trying to join a challenge for the first time.
- Unread chat indicator now alerts when there are unread comments for the group
- Introducing challenge groups! Now you can create a challenge series, making it easy for both challenge creators and players to keep the challenge going without needing to start from scratch.
- New icon and launch screen.

- New group based comments, including fixes to check-in comments not loading and sometimes even crashing.
- Fixed an issue where sometimes new users weren't being asked to sign up when trying to join a challenge for the first time.
- Unread chat indicator now alerts when there are unread comments for the group
- Introducing challenge groups! Now you can create a challenge series, making it easy for both challenge creators and players to keep the challenge going without needing to start from scratch.
- New icon and launch screen.

- iOS 14 support

- New group based comments, including fixes to check-in comments not loading and sometimes even crashing.
- Fixed an issue where sometimes new users weren't being asked to sign up when trying to join a challenge for the first time.
- Unread chat indicator now alerts when there are unread comments for the group
- Introducing challenge groups! Now you can create a challenge series, making it easy for both challenge creators and players to keep the challenge going without needing to start from scratch.
- New icon and launch screen.

- iOS 14 support

- New group based comments, including fixes to check-in comments not loading and sometimes even crashing.
- Fixed an issue where sometimes new users weren't being asked to sign up when trying to join a challenge for the first time.
- Unread chat indicator now alerts when there are unread comments for the group
- Introducing challenge groups! Now you can create a challenge series, making it easy for both challenge creators and players to keep the challenge going without needing to start from scratch.
- New icon and launch screen.
